history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04286
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE COCONUT FARMERS AND INDUSTRY TRUST FUND AND PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND UTILIZATION
SHORT TITLE : Coconut Farmers And Industry Development Act
ABSTRACT : Seeks to address the decades-long struggle of coconut farmers by enacting a genuine law on the use of the coconut levy funds, thus providing a mechanism to protect the rights, welfare and interest of the small and marginalized coconut farmers and farm workers.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARIN, SHARON S.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Batocabe (022 2017-09-11)2. Co (022 2017-09-11)
3. Nieto (023 2017-09-12)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-23
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-23
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 62, 102, 164, 301, 557, 2175, 2266, 2749, 2833, 2840, 3523, 4089, 4224, 4286, 4632 and 4803 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB05745
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2016-11-09
